div.h3: East Quogue Board of Education Meeting @ Tue Apr 21, 2020 7pm - 8pm
div.div:
Time: Apr 21, 2020 07:00 PM Eastern Time (US and Canada)
Join Zoom Meeting
Meeting ID: 924 0194 5575
Password: 029209
One tap mobile
+16468769923,,92401945575# US (New York)
Dial by your location
+1 646 876 9923 US (New York)

img.title: Garden Update
img.alt: Garden Update Default

div.img:
Garden Update The Earth Rangers in action harvesting new crops in our School Garden. Another new and exciting initiative at the East Quogue Elementary School. We're very proud of our Earth Rangers!
